item.title: Exploratory Study Of Human-AI Interaction For Hindustani Music
item.description: Paper presented at NeurIPS Creative AI Track 2024. Abstract This paper presents a study of participants interacting with and using GaMaDHaNi, a novel hierarchical generative model for Hindustani vocal contours.

item.title: Hierarchical Generative Modeling of Melodic Vocal Contours in Hindustani Classical Music
item.description: Paper presented at ISMIR 2024. Abstract Hindustani music is a performance-driven oral tradition that exhibits the rendition of rich melodic patterns.

item.title: Tap Tap Revolution: A study of rhythm reproduction from jazz solos with visual aids
item.description: For my HCI course project in Fall 2022, I decided to study the role of visual aids such as piano roll and music notation in aiding the memorization and reproduction of note onset timings in a jazz improvisation with respect to a backing track.

item.title: Raga classification from vocal performance using multimodal analysis
item.description: Update: This paper won the ‘best special call paper award’ at ISMIR 2022.
